headline: Is Autodesk (ADSK) Turning Its AI Design Push Into a Durable Competitive Moat?
summary: Recently, J.P. Morgan upgraded Autodesk’s rating to Overweight, pointing to the company’s leadership in design and BIM software and its rapid adoption of cloud and AI technologies across high-growth verticals such as data centers and infrastructure. This shift in analyst sentiment highlights how Autodesk’s push into generative AI and cloud-native platforms is increasingly shaping how large firms consolidate their design and compliance software stacks. With this backdrop and Autodesk’s...
